backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping white-background UI requirements to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and styling details of key frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Runbook outlining steps to rebuild and deploy the website without source changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and enforcing a pure white background across html, body, and root.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata and mounting root element for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all site sections and enforcing white backgrounds on layout containers.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section presenting company information and feature cards on a white background.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section showing phone, address, hours, and a call-to-action panel, all styled with white backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the landing hero section with call-to-action buttons, a scroll-to-contact handler, and location info.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Displays the companyâ€™s processing steps and capability list using mapped UI blocks and icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Product: Shows a grid of processed husk product types with descriptions, applications, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with company info, navigation links, contact details, and branding, all on a white background.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive white-background header with scroll effects, navigation links, and call button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and exposing authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes and global typography.
frontend/src/lib/contact.ts: Exports the phone number constants for display and dialing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and a pending request related to enforcing a white background across all pages.
